cs.ualberta.ca.medlog.controller

Class SyncController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.ca.medlog.controller.SyncController

  • public class SyncController
extends java.lang.Object

    Description:
    The controller designed to sync changes between offline and online.

    Issues:
    The two functions must be finished.

    See Also:
    Patient, CareProvider

    • Method Detail

      • syncPatient

        public void syncPatient(java.lang.String username)
                 throws java.net.ConnectException,
                        java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sync a patient between the local and remote versions.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the patient
        Throws:
        java.net.ConnectException - If unable to connect to the server
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If we have a local copy but a remote one does not exist

      • syncCareProvider

        public void syncCareProvider(java.lang.String username)
                      throws java.net.ConnectException,
                             java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sync a provider between the local and remote versions.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the care provider
        Throws:
        java.net.ConnectException - If unable to connect to the server
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If we have a local copy but a remote one does not exist

      • updateCareProviderPatients

        public CareProvider updateCareProviderPatients(CareProvider careProvider)
        Updated all care provider information on their patients. Should be called on login.
        Parameters:
        careProvider - The careprovider to update.

      • downloadAllPhotos

        public java.lang.Boolean downloadAllPhotos(java.lang.String username,
                                           java.util.ArrayList<Photo> photos)
        Download all photos in a photos array provided the patient username
        Parameters:
        username - The patients username. MUST BE THE PHOTO OWNER!
        photos - An array of photos.
        Returns:
        A boolean if they were downloaded successfully.

      • downloadAllPhotos

        public java.lang.Boolean downloadAllPhotos(Patient p)
        Download all patient photos from the database at once.
        Parameters:
        p - The patient to get all photos for
        Returns:
        A boolean if all photos downloaded properly.
